transportAdvice: Santa Fe has a local bus system that serves the downtown and some tourist areas, but most visitors find the historic Plaza district and Canyon Road walkable; taxis and ride-hailing services are available for reaching destinations beyond the compact city center.

weather.description: Cold and crisp winter days with occasional snow, clear skies are common and the air is dry.
Still cold but slightly warmer than January, with occasional snow and plenty of sunny days.
Early spring brings mild afternoons and cool nights, with occasional wind and light precipitation.
Pleasant spring weather with warm days and cool nights, low humidity and mostly sunny skies.
Warm and dry with long sunny days, one of the most comfortable months to visit.
Hot and dry before the monsoon season, afternoons can be intense but evenings cool down nicely.
Monsoon season brings frequent afternoon thunderstorms, mornings are usually clear and warm.
Continued monsoon activity with afternoon showers, lush landscapes and cooler temperatures than June.
Monsoon tapers off, bringing warm days and cool nights with beautiful golden light.
Crisp autumn weather with stunning foliage, cool nights and comfortable sunny afternoons.
Cool to cold with occasional early snow, dry air and clear skies are typical.
Cold winter month with possible snow, festive holiday atmosphere in the historic city center.
